modDesc.changeLog:
1.2.1.31 - More functionality added to console-command, so it becomes easier to switch/try between "game default" and "QuickCamera fix": - modQuickCameraSteeringRotSpeed ON / OFF - to turn on/off feature for current active camera - modQuickCameraSteeringRotSpeed TOGGLE - to disable/enable feature for all affected vehicles - Tweaked the values for articulated vehicle steering rotation fix
1.2.0.30 - Updated readme file, explaning the 'articulated vehicles steering rotation fix' features - Machine translations done for; DE, ES, PL, RU - Included vehicle for articulated vehicle steering rotation fix; Challenger MT900E - Bug fixed in saving-code for articulated vehicle steering rotation fix
1.2.0.29 - Translations updated by contributers; - Italian by Xno - French by Anonymous
1.2.0.28 - Articulated vehicles steering rotation fix - Affected vehicles; Liebherr L 538, New Holland T9, JCB TM320S/435S, Ponsse ScorpionKing/Buffalo, Sampo Rosenlew HR46X - Currently only modifiable via console-command; modQuickCameraSteeringRotSpeed <new_rotation_value> - User configuration-file saved to; /modsSettings/QuickCamera_Config.xml
1.1.1.26 - Fix for 'look forward 359-degree rotation', so it now does a 'look forward -1 rotation' instead.
1.1.0.25 - Added player on-foot quick-rotation actions; 45° left/right, 180° turn -- NOTE! Remember to set the action keys yourself, as they are default set to nothing.
1.0.1.24 - Translations updated by contributers
1.0.1.23 - Fix so QuickCamera keys won't be active when a GUI is shown
1.0.1.22 - Fix for reverse driving and looking forward/backwards

description.en:
Use keys to quickly have the vehicle camera; - peek left/right, rotate 45°/90° - look forwards/backwards, zoom in/out
Or when player is 'on foot'; - rotate 45°/180°
ATTENTION: Remember to set your own actions keys, in the Options / Controls screen, if needed.
Update 1.2.1.31 - Added articulated vehicles steering rotation fix (see ModHub for instructions) - Added player on-foot quick-rotation actions; 45° left/right, 180° turn - Translations updated by contributers & some machine-translated - Fix for reverse driving and looking forward/backwards - Fix so QuickCamera keys won't be active when a GUI is shown
description.de:
Benutze folgende Tasten um schnell die Kamera zu bewegen: - Kurzer Blick nach links / rechts, Rotieren um 45°/ 90° - Sicht nach vorne / hinten, Zoom hinein / hinaus
Oder wenn der Spieler zu Fuß ist; - 45° / 180° drehen
ACHTUNG: Denken Sie daran, Ihre eigenen Handlungsschlüssel einzustellen, im Bildschirm Optionen / Bedienelemente, falls erforderlich.

description.fr:
Utiliser les touches pour avoir rapidement les vues depuis les véhicules; - Coup d'oeil gauche / droite, Rotation de 45 ° / 90 ° - vue avant / vers l'arrière, Zoom avant / arrière
Ou lorsque le joueur est «à pied»; - tourner 45° / 180°
ATTENTION: n'oubliez pas de définir vos propres touches d'actions, dans l'écran Options / Contrôles, si nécessaire.

description.pl:
Służy do szybkiego operowania kamerą pojazdu. - peek left/right, Obrót 45°/90° w lewo/prawo, - spoglądanie w przód/tył, lub przybliżanie/oddalanie

description.ru:
Используется для быстрого управления камерой: - быстро посмотреть налево/направо, вращение на 45/90-градусов влево/вправо, - быстро посмотреть вперед/назад или приблизить/отдалить
Или когда игрок находится «на ногах»: - повернуться на 45°/180°
ВНИМАНИЕ: Не забудьте установить свои собственные клавиши действий в разделе «Параметры / Элементы управления», если это необходимо.
